ModMetaData.name: Sun Tzu Raider Tactics
ModMetaData.author: Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.17.0.1
<size=20>Description</size> Adds a new and challenging raid type. Pirate raiders will split up to try and flank you.
<size=20>How to use</size> Step 1. Install mod. Save to add or remove from any existing savegame. Step 2. Get rekt.
<size=20>Credits and thanks:</size> - The modding discord, in particular Why_is_that and erdelf, for helping with code. - Xen, for making most of the preview image. - XeoNovaDan and VanillaPCStrategy, for testing.
